welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sakae, Japan! This vibrant city is known for its bustling streets, delicious food, and rich culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Sakae has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights, with a variety of shops and dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Primarily used for domestic flights, with a smaller selection of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Registration required with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibaraki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all cargo and freight operations at Ibaraki Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
